MultipleChoice.Title: Describing places
MultipleChoice.Instruction: Click on the word/phrase with the same meaning as the word/phrase in italics.

Content.Question:
1. The dam they are building will be vast.beautiful
very modern
absolutely enormous

2. The market is always bustling on Saturday.full of people and movement
empty
full of different types of people

3. Without renovation, this church will become too run-down to be used.dangerous
poor, lacking in finances
in poor condition because used a lot

4. The student population is extremely diverse.popular
varied
with very large numbers

5. Despite a large intake of tourists every summer, the island is still unspoilt.true to its natural character/not changed
mysterious/unknown to most people
naturally beautiful

6. We strolled for hours along the bright boulevards of Paris.walked quickly
ran in order to keep fit
walked in a relaxed way

7. If you gaze at a cloud long enough, you will always see a face.think about
create an image eg. draw/photograph something
look at, attentively, for a long time

8. Many different races and nationalities live side by side.under the same roof
next to each other
peacefully
